BondPotentialImpl< Interaction > Class Template Reference
Bond Potentials

Detailed Description

template<class Interaction>
class McMd::BondPotentialImpl< Interaction >

Implementation template for a BondPotential.

Member Function Documentation

void readParam ( std::istream &  in) [virtual]

Read potential energy.

This method reads the bond potential Interaction parameter block. Before calling Interaction::readParam(), it passes simulation().nBondType() to Interaction::setNAtomType().

Reimplemented from ParamComposite.
